titleStmt.title: Jockies lamentation, whose seditious work was the loss of his country, and his kirk. To a stately new Scottish tune.
titleStmt.author: S. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Grove on Snow-hill,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Printed in black letter, in two columns.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
